title: Ghost Admission Proposals - GAP#1
body:
Proposal for admitting and granting Community Manager - Ghost Maker role to @P00rYor1ck#4691, a Community Manager with previous experience in this role.

Motivation

To create and manage implementations of projects and strategies to grow and engage GFDao's community.

- Details:
    - @P00rYor1ck#4691 has extensive experience in community management. 
    - He has time available to work on the project and decided to evolve from 
      Ghost Tribe partner (GPP#12) to Ghost Maker. 

Protocol Agent Credentials (Proposal's Author)
- Contributions:
  - @shacketh - Early Ghost, Ghost Maker of GF, HR, and TGF  @ Ghost Finance
  - Research, architecture, and processes on behalf of GFDAO
  - Contributor GFDao Litepaper

Relevant Information
- Members who participated in the meeting with the candidate: Im0rya and Shacketh
- Ghost Maker Reward: 500.000 GHO
- Vesting: GM Bounty normal vesting schedule
- Litepaper > Ghost FInance DAO > Ghost Makers: https://docs.ghost.finance/#1ad3b2d387ad446eb67265394224e360
author: 0x56d78862dcC0bf47C87bdE39BAD9a5A4e9085D00
